plugin.title: Add Skimlinks Option to Edit Options Form
Add Skimlinks JavaScript to footer template

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Global
phrasetype.phrase: Skimlinks Advanced Options
Dissociate account

Skimlinks is currently disabled for your forum.

To enable Skimlinks, please turn it On in the Global Options below.

Note: The configuration settings that you have chosen will be respected when Skimlinks is enabled.
Account Details
Account Information
Activate account
Account Activation Unsuccessful
Activate new account

Account Activation Successful

Congratulations, we've activated your Skimlinks account and your Publisher ID has been associated with this plugin.

Please click Finish to complete the Activation process.
 
You will shortly receive a welcome email to the address that you supplied containing your Skimlinks account and login details. If you don't receive this email in the next few minutes, please check your junk email folder. If it still isn't there, please contact support@skimlinks.com.

To finalize your account dissociation, please press OK and then the Save button on the Global Options page of the Skimlinks plugin.

Once this is done, your Skimlinks account association will be removed from this plugin.

Skimlinks products will no longer be active on your site.

To associate a different Skimlinks account, re-associate the same account, or activate a new account with this plugin, please use the appropriate buttons in the Setup section.
All fields are required
Associate account
Associate existing account
To associate your Skimlinks Account with this plugin, all you need to provide is the email address associated with your Skimlinks Account and your forum domain. We will do all the rest!

Account Association Successful

Congratulations, we've successfully associated your Skimlinks account and your Publisher ID has been added to this plugin.
 
Please click Finish to complete the Association process.
Back
Cancel
Confirm
Please confirm that the details you have provided are correct to ensure that we can associate your Skimlinks account straightaway.

Please confirm you would like to remove the association between your Skimlinks account and this plugin. By doing so, all Skimlinks products will be immediately disabled on this forum.\n\nYou can always associate a different Skimlinks account, re-associate the same account, or activate a new account from the Setup section in this plugin.

Please confirm that the details you have provided are correct before we create your account. The email address that you provide will become your Skimlinks account username and where we send all your account information, details and updates, so please especially make sure this field is correct.
Create account
Domain
Edit information
Email address
Globally enable the Skimlinks technology on your forum here:
Enter
Finish

Signing up to Skimlinks is free, takes hardly any time, and allows you to start earning through the Skimlinks technology straightaway. We only need the basics to get you started. Fill in the form below and your Skimlinks account will be immediately activated and ready to go.
Full Name
This field is necessary to activate your account
This field is necessary to associate your account
If you are new to Skimlinks, simply Activate your new account. If you are already a Skimlinks publisher, Associate your existing account with this plugin.
Next step
Return to Global Options
Setup
Setup - Status

Note: By activating your Skimlinks account, you are agreeing to abide by the Skimlinks Terms of Service. This contract will be between you and Skimlinks. You will be able to track your site's Skimlinks revenue by logging into your Skimlinks account, and revenues generated by the use of Skimlinks will be issued to the associated Skimlinks account. The details you provide here will be sent to Skimlinks and your account immediately activated.

Please add support@skimlinks.com to your email safe list as all email contact from Skimlinks, including your account information and login, will come from this address.
Please enter a valid email address
Website Information
Skimlinks Plugin
Product Level Options

You can control the activation of SkimLinks and SkimWords products in various ways, including by usergroups, sections of your forum, age of threads, and allowing users to control the activation of products themselves.
Please visit the Advanced Options page from the menu on the left to view and configure these options.

To enable and setup specific Skimlinks products, please visit your Skimlinks Publisher Interface.
From there you can further configure your Skimlinks account and settings, view detailed traffic and revenue reports. All revenue earned will be issued to your Skimlinks account.

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Home Pages
phrasetype.phrase: Skimlinks Global Options
SkimLinks Options
SkimWords Options

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Options
phrasetype.phrase: Allow Users to Disable Skimlinks
All threads
Only threads whose last post is older than:
Activate Skimlinks products...
Activate Skimlinks products within these forums:
Activate SkimLinks in...
Activate SkimWords in...
SkimLinks will be active within the following forums:
SkimLinks will be active for viewing users in the following usergroups:

SkimLinks will automatically convert links to merchants (eBay, Amazon, Bestbuy etc.) that forum users have added to affiliate links when clicked. If a sale is made, you earn a commission. This is virtually invisible to your forum users (a small redirect when tracking is added), so it is recommended to be enabled for all usergroups and forums.

SkimWords will automatically convert product references in posts into shopping links. Since SkimWords adds links where there weren't any before, it is visible to your end users. However, it is well-targeted and never adds too many links to the page. For the best revenue opportunity it is recommended to be enabled for all usergroups and forums.

You may hide SkimLinks and SkimWords features from visitors belonging to specific usergroups, disable it for entire forums, by the age of threads, and allow your users to control the activation of products.
Note that if a user belongs to any usergroup that has SkimLinks or SkimWords disabled, this will disable SkimLinks or SkimWords for them regardless of their membership of any groups that may have SkimLinks or SkimWords enabled.

Note: Please ensure SkimLinks and SkimWords are enabled in your Skimlinks Publisher Interface.
days
Enable Skimlinks
For visitors in these usergroups:
If you have selected 'On' and your publisher ID is present, Skimlinks will be enabled on your forum!
In posts made by these usergroups:

SkimLinks will automatically convert links to merchants (eBay, Amazon, Bestbuy etc.) that forum users have added to affiliate links when clicked. If a sale is made, you earn a commission. This is virtually invisible to your forum users (a small redirect when tracking is added), so it is recommended to be enabled for all usergroups and forums.

You may hide SkimLinks features from visitors belonging to specific usergroups, or disable it for entire forums. Note that if a user belongs to any usergroup that has SkimLinks disabled, this will disable SkimLinks for them regardless of their membership of any groups that may have SkimLinks enabled.

Note: You must ensure SkimLinks is enabled in your publisher admin settings page.

You can control the activation of SkimLinks and SkimWords products in various ways including by Usergroups, sections of your Forum, age of Threads, and allowing Users to control the activation of products themselves.
Please visit the Advanced Settings page from the menu on the left to view and configure these options.

Skimlinks is a simple and easy monetization technology for your forum, available in two products:

• SkimLinks automatically converts existing retailer URLs in your posts into affiliate links on-the-fly.

• SkimWords turns product references in your content into links to the best performing retailer for that product.

We work with over 12,000 retailers from around the world, rewarding you for the role your forum plays in creating and informing purchase intent.
Find out more about how Skimlinks works, or Contact us if you have any questions.

Use this panel to enable Skimlinks quickly on your vBulletin forum and configure when it appears to your users.
Limit Skimlinks product activation based on age of thread
Activate products for visitors in these usergroups:
Activate products for posts made by these usergroups:
Skimlinks publisher ID

Note: These settings are executed after, but fully respect and are in addition to, any settings in the Usergroups and Forums sections above. For example, if you have chosen to deactivate SkimWords for Moderators and only have SkimWords active on posts older than one day, any posts by Moderators over one day old are still excluded.

This is the text that will be displayed to your users when this option is fully enabled, explaining what Skimlinks is and that they can choose to disable it if they so wish.

Note: the text included is suggested, but is fully editable to fit your needs.
Explanatory text to use for this option:
SkimWords will be active within the following forums:
SkimWords will be active for viewing users in the following usergroups:

SkimWords will automatically convert product references in posts into shopping links. Since SkimWords adds links where there weren't any before, it is visible to your end users. However, it is well-targeted and never adds too many links to the page. For the best revenue opportunity is is recommended to be enabled for all usergroups and forums.

You may hide SkimWords features from visitors belonging to specific usergroups, or disable it for entire forums. Note that if a user belongs to any usergroup that has SkimWords disabled, this will disable SkimWords for them regardless of their membership of any groups that may have SkimWords enabled.

Note: You must ensure SkimWords is enabled in your publisher admin settings page.
Users can choose to disable Skimlinks

phrasetype.name: User Tools (global)
phrasetype.phrase: Skimlinks Enabled

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: If you enable this, users will be able to disable the SkimLinks system themselves via their settings.
Allow Users to Disable SkimLinks
Forum IDs listed here will not show SkimLinks. (JSON)
Disable SkimLinks in Forums
Usergroup IDs listed here will not see SkimLinks. (JSON)
Usergroup IDs listed here will not have their posted links processed by SkimLinks. (JSON)
Prevent 'SkimLinking' of Links Posted by Usergroups
Hide SkimLinks from Usergroups
I want to run Skimlinks products on this forum
Skimlinks Enabled

Enter your Skimlinks Publisher ID here.
Get my publisher ID
Skimlinks Publisher ID
Skimlinks Salt
Skimlinks Salt
Activate SkimLinks only in threads whose last post is older than this many days.
SkimLinks Thread Age Limit

This is the text that will be displayed to your users when this option is fully enabled, explaining what SkimLinks is and that they can choose to disable it if they so wish. (Note: the text included is suggested, but is fully editable to fit your needs.)
Description Text for Skimlinks User Disable Option
Forum IDs listed here will not show SkimWords. (JSON)
Disable SkimWords in Forums
Usergroup IDs listed here will not see SkimWords. (JSON)
Usergroup IDs listed here will not have their posts 'Skimmed' for product names by SkimWords. (JSON)
Prevent 'SkimWording' of Links Posted by Usergroups
Hide SkimWords from Usergroups
Activate SkimWords only in threads whose last post is older than this many days.
SkimWords Thread Age Limit

setting.defaultvalue: We use a product called Skimlinks to help us pay the bills for this forum. If you don't want these links to be enabled while you browse the site, you may disable the system here.
